RelatedSentence: Daewoo Engineering and Construction ( Daewoo E&C ) has won a $ 545.8 million deal to build a degassing station ( DGS ) in Iraq , the company said Monday .
Daewoo Engineering and Construction ( Daewoo E&C ) has won a $ 545.8 million deal to build a degassing station ( DGS ) in Iraq , the company said Monday .
The contract calls for Daewoo to undertake the southern part of the three - pronged Zubair DGS project .
The contract calls for Daewoo to undertake the southern part of the three - pronged Zubair DGS project .
A degassing plant is a facility that extracts crude oil from natural gas , sand and sediments .
The extracted crude oil is refined to make gasoline and diesel fuel .
When the construction is completed , the Zubair Oil plant will have a production capacity of 850,000 barrels per day .
Currently it produces 195,000 barrels per day .
The construction takes around 30 months and will start in June .
The company has a total of $ 3.2 billion in contracts overseas this year , including the one for the construction of the Akkas Gas processing plant in Iraq last year .
It seems that we will achieve our annual target of $ 7.2 billion without difficulties , a company official said .
